forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear. Low around 46, with temperatures rising to around 48 overnight. Northeast wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. Northeast wind 2 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

weather_report:
As the night gives way to the early hours, Downtown San Francisco rests beneath a tranquil, clear sky. The air carries a crispness, with temperatures nudging gently around the mid-forties, hinting at the soft embrace of dawn. The serene skyline remains unobstructed, and the gentle northeast breezes sing through the streets, stirring the promise of a warm, sunlit day ahead. Morning will reveal itself slowly, transitioning into a bright, inviting spectacle where the sun beams down on the city, warming the cool remnants of the night.

By midday, the sun will reign supreme, pushing temperatures towards a comfortable sixty degrees. This transformation offers a perfect excuse to gather with friends at a cozy café or stroll through the vibrant streets, basking in the clear luminescence. While the wind makes itself known intermittently, it remains friendly—an occasional gust, playful yet mild. Today is a day for layers, perhaps a light sweater over your favorite shirt, as the warmth of the sun mingles with the breezy caress, ensuring comfort in every moment. Amid the cheerful clarity, consider taking a stroll along the waterfront, where the gentle undulations of the bay echo the tranquility of the day, creating a canvas painted in hues of blue that lure the soul to wander.
